sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Switch, Flex, Button, IconButton } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { HamburgerIcon, CloseIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; export const Header = () => { const [display, changeDisplay] = useState('none') return ( {/* Desktop */} {/* Mobile Content */} } onClick={() => changeDisplay("none")} /> ); };
